task.name: limesolver
task.shortdescription: This task runs the LIne Modelling Engine (LIME).
task.description: This task runs the LIne Modelling Engine (LIME). The user may select from a library of models, set parameters for those models, then run LIME on the model. LIME then solves for the level populations of the specified radiating species.

param.name: radius
param.description: Radius of the model sphere (distUnit)

param.name: minScale
param.description: Minimum spatial model scale (distUnit)

param.name: distUnit
param.description: Unit of radius and minScale ("m", "pc" or "au")

param.name: tcmb
param.description: Temperature of CMB (K)

param.name: sinkPoints
param.description: (Nominal) number of points to go on the model boundary

param.name: pIntensity
param.description: (Nominal) number of points to go in the model interior

param.name: samplingAlgorithm
param.description: Algorithm for grid point random sampling

param.name: sampling
param.description: Random sampling distribution

param.name: lte_only
param.description: Whether to use only the LTE approximation

param.name: init_lte
param.description: Whether use LTE populations as starting values

param.name: nThreads
param.description: Number of threads for parallel processing

param.name: nSolveIters
param.description: Total number of solution iterations desired

param.name: moldatfile
param.description: Input file with transition rates for the radiating molecule

param.name: dust
param.description: Input file with dust opacity data

param.name: gridInFile
param.description: Input file with previously calculated model grid

param.name: gridOutFile
param.description: Output file to contain the model grid information

param.name: resetRNG
param.description: Whether to use the same random number seeds for each solution iteration

param.name: modelID
param.description: Identifier for the model to use.

param.name: T
param.description: Temperature of the core (K)

param.name: rhoc
param.description: Central volume density of the core

param.name: Mstar
param.description: Mass of the central (proto-)star (Msun)

param.name: Rstar
param.description: Radius of the central star (Rsun)

param.name: Tstar
param.description: Effective temperature of the star (K)

param.name: bgdens
param.description: Background number density (floor value for the disk density)(1/cm^3)

param.name: hph
param.description: Ratio of the height of the disk atmosphere above the midplane and the pressure scale height (at all radii)

param.name: plsig1
param.description: Power exponent of the radial surface density distribution

param.name: rin
param.description: Inner Radius of the disk (AU)

param.name: rout
param.description: Outer radius of the disk (AU)

param.name: sig0
param.description: Surface density at rout (g/cm^2)

param.name: mdisk
param.description: Total disk mass (gas + dust; gas-to-dust ratio of 100 is used) (Msun)

param.name: soundspeed
param.description: Sound speed (m/s)

param.name: h0
param.description: Index (from zero) to mass flux ratio list [0.125,0.5,0.75,1.0,1.25])

param.name: ab0
param.description: Abundance at inner edge

param.name: mdot
param.description: Mass loss rate (Msun/yr)

param.name: tin
param.description: Temperature at inner edge (K)

param.name: ve
param.description: Expansion velocity (km/s)

param.name: mdota
param.description: Accretion rate (Msun/year)

param.name: mu
param.description: Ratio of the centrifugal radius to the cloud radius

param.name: nu
param.description: Ratio of the radial velocity to the Kepler velocity at the cloud outer radius

param.name: rc
param.description: Centrifugal radius (AU)

param.name: Tcloud
param.description: Temperature of the cloud (K)

param.name: age
param.description: Age of source (yr)

param.name: Rn
param.description: Validity radius of kinematic approximation (AU)

param.name: userModelPath
param.description: Path of a bespoke model file.

param.name: abundance_func
param.description: Name of special function to use for this result.

param.name: abundance_args
param.description: Arguments to supply to that function.

param.description: Arguments to supply to that function.

param.name: doppler_func
param.description: Name of special function to use for this result.

param.name: doppler_args
param.description: Arguments to supply to that function.

param.description: Name of special function to use for this result.

param.name: temperature_func
param.description: Name of special function to use for this result.
